subprocess_pattern.name: subprocess module usage
subprocess_pattern.description: Uses Python subprocess.run() to execute external commands

pathlib_pattern.name: pathlib for file path operations
pathlib_pattern.description: Uses pathlib.Path for cross-platform file path handling

sqlite_pattern.name: SQLite with row_factory for dict access

json_pattern.description: Uses json.dump() and json.load() for configuration persistence
